sense.def:
To boast about something
, kar smo naredili ali imamo v lasti, pomeni govoriti o nečem tako, da jasno pokažemo, kako ponosni smo na tisto.

cit.quote: bahati se, postavljati se, širokoustiti se

seg.quote: Williams boasted of his influence on the Prime Minister.
It is his boast that he has read the entire works of Trollope.
